column4: Im in Live CD right now, installing ubuntu, in Manual Disk formating section, need help, i can install it in 1 disk (26gb total size) and its ntfs, i need to create other partitions of the 26gb disk? or just install it and format it ?
the installer can resize if you want it to..   I normally resize with gparted and leave part of the HD unalocated.. and let the installer install to that.
ill create a new partition, may i choose logical or primary?
disk partiioning basics.. check google/wiki pages.. In short. You can have 4 Primary Partitions per disk.. One can be  an Extended partition that holds Logicals...
